title: How Squid Game saved Netflix
description:
Colin and Samir discuss how Squid Game Saved Netflix and what creators can learn from the storytelling tactics Squid Games used to keep our attention. 
Subscribe to our free creator economy newsletter: https://www.thepublishpress.com/
Watch the episode on our YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/colinandsamir
